events.name: Shooting at Kurdish Cultural Centre in Paris
events.wd_label: Shooting at Kurdish Cultural Centre in Paris
events.wd_description: A gunman opened fire at a Kurdish Cultural Centre in central Paris, killing three people and wounding others, in what is suspected to be a far-right motivated attack.
events.description: A gunman opened fire at a Kurdish Cultural Centre in central Paris, killing three people and wounding others, in what is suspected to be a far-right motivated attack.

events.name: Shooting Incident
events.wd_description: A gunman targeted the Kurdish Cultural Centre in central Paris, killing three people and injuring others, with the attack appearing to be directed at the Kurdish community.
events.description: A gunman targeted the Kurdish Cultural Centre in central Paris, killing three people and injuring others, with the attack appearing to be directed at the Kurdish community.

events.name: Kurdish Democratic Council's Response
events.wd_description: The Kurdish Democratic Council condemned the attack and announced that a vigil would be held to pay tribute to those killed.
events.description: The Kurdish Democratic Council condemned the attack and announced that a vigil would be held to pay tribute to those killed.

events.name: Paris Mayor's Statement
events.wd_description: Paris Mayor Anne Hidalgo suggested that the attack was carried out by a far-right activist, expressing solidarity with the Kurdish community in Paris.
events.description: Paris Mayor Anne Hidalgo suggested that the attack was carried out by a far-right activist, expressing solidarity with the Kurdish community in Paris.

events.name: Murder Investigation
events.wd_description: Prosecutors in Paris have launched a murder investigation into the shooting, seeking to determine the motives and background of the attacker.
events.description: Prosecutors in Paris have launched a murder investigation into the shooting, seeking to determine the motives and background of the attacker.

events.name: Explosions at Russian Airbases Following Ukrainian Drone Strikes
events.wd_label: Explosions at Russian Airbases Following Ukrainian Drone Strikes
events.wd_description: Two Russian airbases, located far from the frontlines, were hit by explosions, apparently due to Ukrainian drone strikes targeting bombers used by Russia in attacks on Ukraine's electrical grid.
events.description: Two Russian airbases, located far from the frontlines, were hit by explosions, apparently due to Ukrainian drone strikes targeting bombers used by Russia in attacks on Ukraine's electrical grid.

events.name: Drone Strikes on Russian Airbases
events.wd_description: Ukrainian drones reportedly targeted Russian airbases, causing explosions at facilities used by bombers involved in attacks on Ukraine's electrical grid.
events.description: Ukrainian drones reportedly targeted Russian airbases, causing explosions at facilities used by bombers involved in attacks on Ukraine's electrical grid.

events.name: Damage and Casualties
events.wd_description: The explosions damaged two Russian airplanes, and another explosion at Dyagilevo military airbase resulted in three deaths and five injuries after a fuel truck exploded.
events.description: The explosions damaged two Russian airplanes, and another explosion at Dyagilevo military airbase resulted in three deaths and five injuries after a fuel truck exploded.

events.name: Kremlin's Response
events.wd_description: The Kremlin confirmed that President Vladimir Putin had been briefed on the incidents, occurring on the same day he reopened the Crimean Bridge, previously damaged in an explosion.
events.description: The Kremlin confirmed that President Vladimir Putin had been briefed on the incidents, occurring on the same day he reopened the Crimean Bridge, previously damaged in an explosion.

events.name: North Korean Missile Launch Over Japan
events.wd_label: North Korean Missile Launch Over Japan
events.wd_description: North Korea fired at least one ballistic missile over Japan, marking a potential escalation and the 23rd missile launch by North Korea this year.
events.description: North Korea fired at least one ballistic missile over Japan, marking a potential escalation and the 23rd missile launch by North Korea this year.

events.name: Missile Launch
events.wd_description: North Korea launched a ballistic missile over Japan, with the missile reportedly passing over the northern Japanese island of Hokkaido.
events.description: North Korea launched a ballistic missile over Japan, with the missile reportedly passing over the northern Japanese island of Hokkaido.

events.name: Japanese Government Response
events.wd_description: The Japanese government issued a warning to civilians to avoid suspicious objects and to report them to authorities, following the missile's trajectory over Japan.
events.description: The Japanese government issued a warning to civilians to avoid suspicious objects and to report them to authorities, following the missile's trajectory over Japan.

events.name: Regional Reactions
events.wd_description: The missile launch, confirmed by South Korea's Joint Chiefs of Staff, marked a rare event of a missile being fired over Japan, raising regional tensions.
events.description: The missile launch, confirmed by South Korea's Joint Chiefs of Staff, marked a rare event of a missile being fired over Japan, raising regional tensions.

events.name: Stellantis Secures Raw Materials for EV Batteries
events.wd_label: Stellantis Secures Raw Materials for EV Batteries
events.wd_description: Stellantis has signed a memorandum of understanding with GME Resources Limited to secure raw materials, including nickel and cobalt, needed for EV battery production, aiming to meet its decarbonization and EV production targets.
events.description: Stellantis has signed a memorandum of understanding with GME Resources Limited to secure raw materials, including nickel and cobalt, needed for EV battery production, aiming to meet its decarbonization and EV production targets.

events.name: Agreement with GME Resources
events.wd_description: Stellantis and GME Resources Limited have agreed on the future sale of battery-grade nickel and cobalt sulphate products from the NiWest Nickel-Cobalt Project in western Australia.
events.description: Stellantis and GME Resources Limited have agreed on the future sale of battery-grade nickel and cobalt sulphate products from the NiWest Nickel-Cobalt Project in western Australia.

events.name: Industry-Wide Efforts to Secure Raw Materials
events.wd_label: Industry-Wide Efforts to Secure Raw Materials
events.wd_description: Automakers, including Stellantis, GM, and Ford, are securing raw materials for EV batteries in response to government policies and growing consumer demand for electric vehicles.
events.description: Automakers, including Stellantis, GM, and Ford, are securing raw materials for EV batteries in response to government policies and growing consumer demand for electric vehicles.
